speaker: NATIVE AMERICAN
line: Where are you going.?

speaker: ERIC
line: Riding. I'll be back in a few hours.

speaker: ALBERT
line: Eric. Leave the snakes alone today. They'll be angry and afraid.

speaker: NATIVE AMERICAN
line: What is it.?

speaker: ALBERT
line: The Earth has a secret it needs to tell.

speaker: ERIC
line: I found something. Better come see.

speaker: ERIC
line: What do you think it is?

speaker: NATIVE AMERICAN
line: I don't know.

speaker: ERIC
line: What did he say.?

speaker: NATIVE AMERICAN
line: He said it should be returned. They will be coming.

speaker: THE THINKER
line: You bitch.! Beautiful.!

speaker: ITALIAN OFFICIAL
line: What is it Antonio.?

speaker: ANTONIO
line: Someone has broken into the MJ documents.

speaker: ITALIAN OFFICIAL
line: Who would do such a thing

speaker: ANTONIO
line: I don't know.

speaker: JAPANESE OFFICIAL
line: from where did you hear this.? Has everyone been told.?

speaker: GERMAN OFFICIAL
line: yes, I understand. No this is their problem. They must take care of it promptly. .

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: yes.

speaker: GERMAN OFFICIAL
line: You are familiar with the MJ file.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Ja. I have already taken care of it.

speaker: GERMAN OFFICIAL
line: Good.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Gentlemen. That was the phone call I never wanted to get.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you guys doing here.?

speaker: BYERS
line: Can we talk inside.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm not feeling well. I didn't sleep last night. I'm really not in the mood for the three stooges.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: I don't think we've been followed.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who would follow you.?

speaker: BYERS
line: Multinational black opps unit. Code name Garnett.

speaker: LANGLY
line: Trained killers. School of the American Alumni.

speaker: MULDER
line: Have you boys been defacing library books again.?

speaker: FROHIKE
line: They don't want us. They want him.

speaker: MULDER
line: Kennith Suna.

speaker: LANGLY
line: We think that's his real name.

speaker: BYERS
line: You've heard us refer to him as The Thinker.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did he do.?

speaker: BYRES
line: Hacked into the defense department computer system.

speaker: MULDER
line: What.?

speaker: BYERS
line: The Thinker's an anarchist and a snoop. Whatever he got into has made him a very wanted man. Customs and immigration are on full alert. Every port of igress is closed.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you coming to me for.?

speaker: BYERS
line: In his last communique, The Thinker named a meeting place and a three hour time window. He asked specifically for you.

speaker: LANGLY
line: The only problem is he may already be dead.

speaker: MULDER
line: What happened.?

speaker: WOMAN
line: She just shot her husband. They'd been married for thirty years. It's like she went crazy.

speaker: COP
line: Everybody go back to your appartment, we'll handle this.

speaker: FROHIKE
line: Weirdness.

speaker: THE THINKER
line: I... I don't want you to know my real name. I... I just don't think it's that important that you know.

speaker: MULDER
line: Sounds like a line I used in a bar once.

speaker: THE THINKER
line: Look, I'm sorry about the wait but I kinda got this ninja party shaking my butt.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why.? What've you got.?

speaker: THE THINKER
line: Well if I'm correct I got the original defense departments UFO intelligence files. Everything from the 1940's and up.

speaker: MULDER
line: Everything.?

speaker: THE THINKER
line: Everything. Roswell, MJ12 and beyond.

speaker: MULDER
line: You've read them.?

speaker: THE THINKER
line: Not entirely. I downloaded all I could and then I split. I mean, I knew that these guys would be after me.

speaker: MULDER
line: What makes you think they know who you are.?

speaker: THE THINKER
line: I didn't take any procautions. I mean I... I did'nt even expect to get inside. .

speaker: MULDER
line: You know they always denied that these files even existed. What do you want from me.?

speaker: THE THINKER
line: I want the truth. And I want you to promise that those rat bastards answer to the people.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, Skinner's looking for you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Come in and lock the door.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why, what's going on.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Are you familiar with the ten commandments Scully.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: You want me to recite them.?

speaker: MULDER
line: No. Just number 4, the one about obeying the sabbath, the part about where God made Heaven and Earth but didn't bother to tell anybody about his side projects.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you talking about.?

speaker: MULDER
line: The biggest lie of all.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is this.?

speaker: MULDER
line: The Holy Grail. The original defense department files. Hard evidence that the government has known about the existance of extraterrestrials for over fifty years.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where did you get this.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Your friendly neighborhood anarchist.

speaker: MULDER
line: I dont believe this. This is just gibberish. . Damn it. I'm so sick of this crap, BS and double talk. I can't believe this.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, this may not be gibberish.

speaker: MULDER
line: It's a joke Scully, it's a bad joke.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I think it's just encrypted and I think I recognise it. It looks like Navajo. It was used in world war two. My father told me it was the only code the Japanese couldn't break, I... I remember the long strings of consonants.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well can you find out.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well only a handful of people can decipher it.

speaker: MULDER
line: Then find one of em.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder. Are you okay.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah. I just haven't been sleeping.

speaker: MULDER
line: Sir.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder. I need to speak with you.

speaker: MULDER
line: About.?

speaker: SKINNER
line: In my office.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why.? Is this another jerk off assignment where I end up doing the government's dirty work.?

speaker: SKINNER
line: It's about a rumor that you may be in reciept of some sensitive files.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know anything about that. .

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder listen... I'm talking to you...

speaker: SKINNER
line: Are we done. We're done.

speaker: DIRECTOR 1
line: Agent Scully, you heard about the incident here, in the hallway yesterday.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes sir.

speaker: DIRECTOR 1
line: Do you have any explanation as to agent Mulder's, bizarre behavior.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No sir. Agent Mulder told me he was having trouble sleeping.

speaker: DIRECTOR 1
line: Do you think agent Mulder confides in you agent Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Of course, he's my partner.

speaker: DIRECTOR 2
line: Your partner. Were'nt you originally assigned to agent Mulder to debunk his work.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes sir. A year and a half ago. I've been writing regular reports stating the validity of agent Mulder's work on The X-Files.

speaker: DIRECTOR 2
line: Would you lie to protect him.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Am I accused of lying.?

speaker: DIRECTOR 3
line: Agent Mulder has been advised of a disciplinary hearing. If there's something we learn at that meeting that you haven't stated today, you could be subject to the same summary action.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What action is that.?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Dismissal without chance of reinstatement.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Is that all sir.?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yes agent Scully, thank you.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Hello Bill.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: What are you doing here.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: I've come on some pressing business.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: We had agreed that you would never...

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: That was a long time ago Bill. There have been some unforseen events.

speaker: BILL
line: No one was supposed to know.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Who could have predicted the future Bill? That the computers that you and I only dreamed of would someday be home appliances capable of the most technical espionage.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: The files should have been destroyed.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: They should have, but they were'nt. Regret is an inevitable consequence of life.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: How do you know my son has them.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: The man who stole them has come forward.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Oh God.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: As always we maintain plausible denial. The files are only as real as their possible authentication.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: My name is in those files.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: The files have been encrypted of course. We have a certain luxury of time. We endevored to prevent that fact from ever coming to light.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: You wouldn't... harm him.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: I've protected him this long, haven't I.? Your son has been provident in the alliances that he's created. The last thing we need is a martyr in a crusade.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: But if he should, learn of my involvement...

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Your you're own man Bill. You always have been. But I strongly encourage you in that event, to deny everything. It's good to see you again Bill. You look well.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You didn't answer your door.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh. I took a pill.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I couldn't find you at work. I was worried about you.

speaker: MULDER
line: I came home. I must be running a fever. Maybe it's the threat of being burnt at the stake.

speaker: SCULLY
line: They called me in today.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did you tell them.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: That nothing was wrong.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well you told them the truth then.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, you opened the door for them, they're just looking for a good reason now.

speaker: MULDER
line: Okay, I'll say I'm sorry.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, these files. Who knows you have them.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Why.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Because I had to lie today. And I put my job in jeopardy in order to do so. If they find out about those files...

speaker: MULDER
line: How would they find out.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Maybe they already know. The question is, is it worth it.? Is this cassette worth risking everything.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'll tell you when I find out what's on it. Now just tell me who I can talk to about breaking that code.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm meeting with someone in an hour. I might know something later tonight, I just need some kind of assurance that they're not going to let us hang ourselves with this. That I'm doing the right thing.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'll try to find out.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I need to know one more thing Mulder. Why did you attack Skinner.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I've thought of that Scully. I honestly can't say.

speaker: NAVAJO WOMAN
line: This is all you have.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Currently yes.

speaker: NAVAJO WOMAN
line: There are words I recognise but you'll need an actual code talker to make any sense of this. I know a man who might help. I could have him contact you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah, thank you... er... can you tell me which words you do recognise.?

speaker: NAVAJO WOMAN
line: This word, it means goods, merchandise. And this one means vaccination. They're both modern words which is why they stand out.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thank you. You've been very helpful.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Fox, this is your father, I need to see you right away.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where are you.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: I'm at home. How soon can you be here.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Fox, it's very important.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Fox.

speaker: MULDER
line: Dad. What is it.?

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Come in. . It's... Its so clear now. Simple. It was so complicated then. The, the choices that needed to be made.

speaker: MULDER
line: What choices.? Dad.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: You're a smart boy Fox. You're smarter than I ever was.

speaker: MULDER
line: About what.?

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Your politics are yours, you've never thrown in. The minute you do that, their doctrines become yours and you can be held responsible.

speaker: MULDER
line: You're talking about your work in the state department.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: You're going to learn of things... Fox, you're going to hear the words and they'll come to make sense to you.

speaker: MULDER
line: What words.?

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: The merchandise. Look I, I've been taking some medication. You'll have to excuse me for a moment.

speaker: MULDER
line: Dad.? Dad. Dad . Oh dad.

speaker: BILL MULDER
line: Forgive me...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hello.

speaker: MULDER
line: My father's dead Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where are you.?

speaker: MULDER
line: They shot him and he's dead.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder where are you.? Just tell me where you are.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm on the Vineyard.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who shot him Mulder.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, were you arguing.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I didn't do it Scully, he was trying to tell me something.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder listen to me...

speaker: MULDER
line: You gotta believe me Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder I believe you, just listen to me, you've gotta get out of there, you have to leave immediately.

speaker: MULDER
line: I can't leave the crime scene, it'll look like I'm running, make me look guilty.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder they're gonna suspect you anyway, you've got no ID on the shooter, you, your behavior has been irrational recently, Mulder can't you see that everything is pointing directly at you?

speaker: MULDER
line: He was shot with somebody else's weapon.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Damn it Mulder, you're an FBI agent, you have access to weapons other than your own.

speaker: MULDER
line: All right. Meet me back at my apartment.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No. No you can't come home. Someone shot through your window tonight, they almost killed me, they might be trying to kill you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Fox... My God. Look at you. You're sick.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm okay.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No come on, I want you to lie down on, woah, come on I want you to lie down, let me take your coat off.

speaker: MULDER
line: You gotta find them Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Right now you have to lie down. Come here.

speaker: MULDER
line: We gotta find out who killed my father.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well right now you need to rest okay, rest. It's okay. Okay.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully. .

speaker: FBI GUY
line: I'll run a comparison as soon as they send me the bullet removed from the victim.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How long will it take to determine if there a match.?

speaker: FBI GUY
line: There both 9mm rounds. Run the specs compare the stray. We should know pretty much right away.

speaker: MULDER
line: You took my gun. You think I did it don't you.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I took your gun to run it through ballistics to try and clear you Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well why didn't you ask me.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: You had a temperature of 102 last night I didn't want to wake you.

speaker: MULDER
line: What were you afraid that I was gonna shoot you too.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, I'm being called into Skinners office this afternoon, they're gonna want answers and I'd like some good ones to give them.

speaker: MULDER
line: So you can clear your conscience and your name?! You've been making reports on me since the beginning Scully, taking your little notes!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder you're sick, you're not thinking straight, I'm on your side. You know that.

speaker: MULDER
line: Look you have my files and you have my gun. Don't ask me for my trust.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mul...

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm gonna kill you anyway Krycek so you may as well tell me the truth. Did you kill my father.? Did you kill him... answer me. .

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, don't shoot him. Just back away.

speaker: MULDER
line: He killed my father Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I have him Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: No Scully...

speaker: WOMAN'S VOICE
line: Oh my God. Somebody call the police.

speaker: ALBERT
line: He's awake.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, Mulder it's me. Here drink some of that, you haven't had any water in over 36 hours. Your shoulder's going to be fine. The round went through nice and clean.

speaker: MULDER
line: You shot me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yes, I did. You didn't give me much choice, you were going to shoot Krycek.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why'd you shoot me? He's the one.

speaker: SCULLY
line: If he is, then his weapon is probably the same one that killed your father.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you talking about.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: If you killed Krycek with that weapon there would have been no way to prove that you didn't kill your father. I'm sorry about your father Mulder, I haven't been able to tell you.

speaker: MULDER
line: How'd you know it was Krycek.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I didn't. I went back to your apartment to pull the slug from the wall, but I noticed an unmarked van delivering soft water and I found this in one of the tanks servicing your building.

speaker: MULDER
line: What is it.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's a dyalysis filter. It's a device used in the transmission of substance to solution, considering the level of psychosis you were experiencing, it was probably LSD, amphetamines of some kind of exotic dopamine agonist.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh my God. There was a murder in my building.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well it wasn't an excercise in subtlety. Mulder these men are quite possibly the same ones who killed your father and who systematically tried to destroy you by turning everyone you could trust against you. I don't think I have to tell you why.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'd gotten too close to the truth. Where are we.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: We're in Farmington New Mexico.

speaker: MULDER
line: New Mexico.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: We've just driven two days across country, I had to put you out to let the side effects of the psychosis abait. This is Albert Hosteen, he's been translating your files.

speaker: ALBERT
line: You're lucky she's a good shot.

speaker: MULDER
line: Or a bad one.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Albert was a Navajo code talker during world war two. He helped encode the original government documents.

speaker: MULDER
line: How'd you find him.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Through a woman in Washington. But he claims he knew you were coming.

speaker: ALBERT
line: Last week we had an omen.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Most of these files are written in jargon but apparently there was an international conspiracy of silence dating back to the 1940's. Albert says that evidence of these secrets are buried on a Navajo reservation not far from here. He says that he'll take you as soon as you are able.

speaker: MULDER
line: What about you.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm afraid you're on your own with this. I didn't show up for a meeting with Skinner the day before yesterday and I don't know what the repercussions will be.

speaker: MULDER
line: You've taken a big risk.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I was certain they would have killed you Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Thank you. Thank you for taking care of me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: There's something else. My name is in those files. It appears in the latest entries with Duane Barry's.

speaker: MULDER
line: In what context.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's not clear, but it has something to do with a test. I want you to find out Mulder. I need you to.

speaker: MULDER
line: You said you knew I was coming.

speaker: ALBERT
line: In the desert, things find a way to survive. Secrets are like this too. They push their way up through the sands of deception so that men can know them. Here, this is my house.

speaker: MULDER
line: But why me.?

speaker: ALBERT
line: You are prepared to accept the truth aren't you, to sacrifice yourself to it.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't understand.

speaker: ALBERT
line: There was a tribe of indians who lived here more than 600 years ago. Their name was Anasazi, it means ancient aliens. No evidence of their fate exists. Historians say they disappeared without a trace. They say that because they will not sacrifice themselves to the truth.

speaker: MULDER
line: And what is the truth.?

speaker: ALBERT
line: Nothing disappears without a trace.

speaker: MULDER
line: You think they were abducted.

speaker: ALBERT
line: By visitors who come here still.

speaker: MULDER
line: What's buried out there.?

speaker: ALBERT
line: Lies. You will see for yourself.

speaker: ERIC
line: It's through these rocks. It's down there.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: You're a hard man to reach.

speaker: MULDER
line: Not hard enough apparently.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Where are you.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm at the Betty Ford center, where are you.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: I need to talk to you Mr Mulder, in person. There are some things to explain.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'll save the government the plane fare, I just need to know which government that is.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Your father may have told you things Mr Mulder. I should warn against taking those things at face value.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, which things are those.?

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: He was never an opponent of the project. In fact he authorised it. That's what he couldn't live with.

speaker: MULDER
line: No, he couldn't live with it because you had him killed.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: We weren't involved in that.

speaker: MULDER
line: Now listen to me you black lunged son of a bitch, I'm gonna expose you and your project, your time is over.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Expose anything and you only expose your father...

speaker: BLACK OPPS GUY 1
line: Sir, we got a co-ordinate on F were ready to go.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Let's go.

speaker: BLACK OPPS GUT 2
line: Need a cigarette.?

speaker: ERIC
line: Over here.

speaker: MULDER
line: This is a boxcar.

speaker: ERIC
line: Refrigeration car.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Scully.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, it's me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where are you.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nowhere I ever expected.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you mean.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm in a boxcar buried inside a quarry. There are bodies everywhere.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Bodies.?

speaker: MULDER
line: Stacked floor to ceiling.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What happened to them.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, in these files I found references to experiments that were conducted here in the US by Axis Power scientists who were given amnesty after the war.

speaker: MULDER
line: What kind of experiments.?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Some kind of tests, on humans. What they referred to as merchandise.

speaker: MULDER
line: But these aren't human Scully. From the look of it I'd say they were alien.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you sure.?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm pretty damn sure. Wait a sec...

speaker: MULDER
line: This one... has a smallpox vacination scar.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh my God Scully, what have they done.?

speaker: BLACK OPPS GUY 1
line: Move out, get away from there, keep him back. Cover us were going in. Go.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: What's your name boy.?

speaker: BLACK OPPS GUY 1
line: He's not here.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Where's Mulder. He's here.

speaker: BLACK OPPS GUY 1
line: No sir, if he was, he's vanished without a trace.

speaker: CANCERMAN
line: Nothing vanishes without a trace. Burn it.
